column1: Parathyroid cancer is a cancerous (malignant) growth in a parathyroid gland.
There are four parathyroid glands, two on top of each lobe of the thyroid gland, which is located at the base of the neck.
Parathyroid cancer is a very rare type of cancer.
People with a genetic condition called multiple endocrine neoplasia type I have an increased risk of this disease.
